sentences.sentence: Answer: you cop out and buy the LOLcat book. Pish pash, job done.
sentences.translation: 答案是：你会逃避并且买一本小猫咪图片的书。粉碎了你的热情之后一切就结束了。

sentences.sentence: Send an email to Adam Pash, the author of this post, at tips+adam@lifehacker.com.
sentences.translation: 发送邮件给本文的作者，Adam Pash，他的邮箱是 tips+adam@lifehacker.com.

sentences.sentence: At a young age, Pash showed exceptional piloting skills, flying solo by the age of 13.
sentences.translation: 小时候，帕什便表现出杰出的飞行技巧，13岁即可单独飞行。
